name: Cleandot - Cleaner Slashdot 0.02
description: Tired of the ads and random crap gunking up your Slashdot commenting shenanigans? Give this style a shot.
additional_info:
Changelog

* v0.02 -- 2018-07-04
    Updated contact information and tested style without blockers.
    Everything's still looking good. :)

    All future development to take place in git at https://git.zlg.space.

* v0.01 -- 2017-05-20
    Initial version.
    This style gets rid of the right bar, ads, and the "See also" block,
    allowing the reader to focus on the stories and comments. Additionally, it
    better utilizes screen space and gets rid of the horizontal scrollbar that
    appears on smaller windows or screens.

    This has only been tested on my machine, with a few blockers in place. If
    there's anything I've missed that's a real nuisance, let me know and I'll
    look into correcting it.
